channel.title: MoparGameDev contests
channel.description:
http://gamedev.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php
If you don't know MoparGameDev (MGD), its another side of the forums dedicated to game programming and everything related. If you haven't been there feel free to drop by for anything!
[quote="Frell"][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=543808.msg3986037#msg3986037 date=1335903700] Way to link to a post none of them can read :P [/quote] Ugh dammit, I thought that was a public post.
If youre reading this thread just expect and be thinking about a summer contest ;)[/quote]

item.title: MoparGameDev contests
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:19, topic:441131”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=543808.msg3986960#msg3986960 date=1336003972]

Nice advertisement have fun with ban noob

OT
I wish I knew programming, then I could win me one of them shiny badges I’ve always wanted
[/quote]you can ‘know’ programming by taking initiative and learning for yourself

But that takes too long therefor I will just go to the server help section whenever I have trouble with my contest entry.

You do realize you can’t enter an RSPS?[/quote]
Your not getting the point

[quote=“Lin, post:20, topic:441131”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=543808.msg3986960#msg3986960 date=1336003972]

[quote author=_s link=topic=543808.msg3986604#msg3986604 date=1335971977]

Nice advertisement have fun with ban noob

OT
I wish I knew programming, then I could win me one of them shiny badges I’ve always wanted
[/quote]you can ‘know’ programming by taking initiative and learning for yourself

But that takes too long therefor I will just go to the server help section whenever I have trouble with my contest entry.
[/quote]Lol kid you’re funny.[/quote]
ofc!

item.title: MoparGameDev contests
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:14, topic:441131”]Does the project have to be new? I’d like to enter my Path Master 3D game in and not work on it so everyone else has a fair amount of time, primarily to see how much people actually like it.[/quote]Yes. But there’s going to be a specific theme anyways, so it wont work that way Just like ‘snowman’ was the theme from the previous one

Read full topic
